titles.title: Then Shall The Virgin Rejoice In The Dance

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Then shall the virgin rejoice in the dance,
The young man and old man together.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I will turn their mourning into joy.
And I will comfort them.
And I will make them rejoice, rejoice,
Rejoice in their sorrow.
And I will make them rejoice, rejoice,
Rejoice in their sorrow.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Y entonces la virgen
Se alegrará en la danza
Los jóvenes y viejos juntamente

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: La, la, la, la, la, la….

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Cambiaré su lloro en gozo
Y los consolaré
/y los alegraré, los alegraré,
Los alegraré en su dolor/ (2)
